title: Garu ING
subtitle: Subtitle event 1
description: Been itching to show off your football skills that are Bluelock worthy? Or maybe you just got that deadly backhand in badminton? Together with your fellow Garurudians, take on the other houses in a wide variety of sports and create sick highlights that are sure to boost your reputation.

highlights.title: Tchoukball
highlights.description: Garuda Tchoukball Aura farmer Ray Sen poses for the camera.

highlights.title: Badminton
highlights.description: Aura farmer Martin puts up a strong performance.

highlights.title: Post-ING
highlights.description: Happy Garudians celebrating a hard day's of work.

title: Garuween
subtitle: Subtitle event 2
description: Garuda x Halloween! Get ready for a spooky night full of suspense, surprises and segues into food and music and well!

highlights.title: Face Painting
highlights.description: Watch your friends do stuff to their face .

highlights.title: Pizza Party
highlights.description: We do love some good pizza in here.

highlights.title: Fright Night
highlights.description: A wild Kurt Tay terrorises the Garudians.

title: Garumas
subtitle: Subtitle event 3
description: Its that time of the year for all things red, Mariah Carey and gift-giving! Perfect opportunity to ask your friends for what you want, not what you need :)

highlights.title: Performance
highlights.description: Isaac showcases his sick singing talent.

highlights.title: Picture Perfect
highlights.description: Our Garuda girlies enjoying the christmas party.

highlights.title: Gift Exchange
highlights.description: 3SG Ming Rong receives his gift from 2LT Marcus.

title: Welcome Back Dinner
subtitle: Subtitle event 4
description: Get ready to kickstart the new semester with good food, exquitsite performance and dress up as your favourite character with your friends!

highlights.title: Spooderman
highlights.description: With great power comes great responsibility. And a lot of copycats.

highlights.title: Minions
highlights.description: Fun fact: Did you know that minions and Garudians are the same species? THEY ARE BOTH YELLOW THATS CRAZY!

highlights.title: Swag
highlights.description: Fellow Garudian Ming Rong loves showing off his cool spiderman costume! Yippee~

title: Garu Got Groove
subtitle: Subtitle event 5
description: Garuda's very own talent show! Show off your singing, dancing, acting or even your ASMR eating skills in this star-studded event ! The vibes are truly immaculate tonight as everyone comes together to put up a solid and memorable performance.

highlights.title: Duet
highlights.description: Fellow Garudians putting up a lovely duet performance.

highlights.title: Audience
highlights.description: The ever-supportive Garudian audience cheering on their friends.

highlights.title: Ctrl C Ctrl V
highlights.description: Sick guitar performance by the doppelganger trio of Garuda.
